name: After You (Kayo)
description: Over a sea of clouds dominated by dragons and a land situated by giants, the harmony between these two worlds was clear and respected by both sides, but one day these worlds came into conflict. conflict, bringing chaos and moments of horror to history, one day a superior force decided to intervene in the face of so much pain and suffering that had already become an inherited and meaningless hatred, this greater force fragmented this world, thus separating it in different ways over the space in which he found himself, it was said and seen, that on this day, a tear broke the heavens.  Soon after, a dream begins showing an empty and dark space, which gradually becomes starry and takes shape, so something tears this space on the scene by what seems to be a tear running down, but which turns into a shooting star that wanders in search of a place to rest, that is suitable, calm and peaceful, only then will it fall.   "They say that stars are unattainable dreams"   We have plans to make a plot that will talk about death and its phases for overcoming or even its total denial about such an event in the face of the sadness that each one feels.
